presentation.name_presentation: Hey, my name is Kaci MAKOUR and welcome to my Porfolio.
presentation.work_presentation:
I'm currently working as a Data scientist at IQera, a debt recovery company.

I developed this application to create an interactive platform summarizing the main projects I've carried out in data science. I didn't want to use a pre-designed website, it's more fun to design your own web application. I'm always motivated to make my job a powerful tool for extracting meaningful knowledge from large datasets, offering insights and solutions to complex problems. I enjoy communicating my Data skills to enable others to benefit from this world of discovery.

pipeline.hearder_pipeline: üèóÔ∏è Want to know more about each project's pipeline ?

dashboards.hearder_dashboard: üìä Dashboards/ web app demos with Python
dashboards.markdown_dashboard_remark: - Using open data for the demos.

framework_explanation.Dash: Use of Plotly's Dash framework in the context of creating a portfolio pricing application for auctions. The aim was to produce configurable and automated cash flow and cost forecasts.
framework_explanation.Flask: Use of the Flask framework to create an application for modeling constrained tree models. The aim was to provide complete button-click modeling for binary classification and ranking problems.
framework_explanation.Streamlit: This application can indeed be used as a demo (haha :) ) . For confidentiality reasons, the internal control application cannot be used as a demo.

presentation.name_presentation: Bonjour, je m'appelle Kaci MAKOUR et bienvenue sur mon Porfolio.

Je travaille actuellement en tant que Data scientist chez IQera, une société de recouvrement de créances.

J'ai développé cette application afin de créer une plateforme interactive résumant les principaux projets que j'ai réalisés en data science.
